title: Instruction in Project-Based Learning Management
description: Students enroll when assigned as an undergraduate instructional apprentice (UGIA) via the application process. Students will attend course lectures and hold weekly meetings with other students. Responsibilities may include class presentations, designing and leading weekly discussion sections, and providing support for student projects. Prerequisites: completion of SYN 100, restricted to upper-division Seventh College students only, must be taken P/NP only, can be taken once for credit, a student application and departmental approval is required for enrollment, enrollment satisfies the Seventh College high-impact requirement.
